description: Error to fix mappings learned from heal loops. Updated automatically when tests are healed.

antiPatterns.error: strict mode violation: getByRole('button') resolved to multiple elements
antiPatterns.fix: Use more specific selector: getByRole('button', { name: 'Submit' }) or add :visible
antiPatterns.notes: This is a placeholder. Delete after first real anti-pattern is learned.

antiPatterns.error: Timeout exceeded while waiting for element
antiPatterns.fix: Add explicit waitForSelector or increase timeout with getTimeout()
